500.a: Ao alto do título: Water cycle and soil-related aspects.

505.a: ICON: improved control and application of nitrogen cycle bacteria for ammonia removal -- Metasep: selective separation of toxic metals from specific industrial wastewater streams for water and metals re-use -- SMAC: smart control of wastewater systems -- POWADIMA: potable water distribution management -- PHOTOX: photocatalytic destruction of cyanotoxins and pathogens in potable water -- PEBCAT: photo-electro-bio-catalytic treatment of drinking water supplies -- AQUAERATION: improved reservoir water destratification -- INNOWASH: minimization of water consumption in european textile dyeing and printing industry using innovative washing and water recycling technologies -- Water saving pump: new way of water and energy saving cleaning technique to improve the hygienic result -- AWACS : automated water analyser computer supported system -- Phyto-plankton-on-line: interactive regulation of phytoplankton succession by physical forcing and internal phosphorus loading: a comparative study in eutrophic freshwater lakes from different climatic regimes -- Geowaters: integrated geophysical techniques for surveying and quantifying potentially polluted sediments in european waterways -- Mulino: supporting integrated decision-making for sustainable management of water resources in european catchments -- Gouverne: guidelines for the organisation, use and validation of information systems for evaluating aquifer resources and needs.
